Deities @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ravithra]{Ravithra}

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Split the Tongue]{Split the Tongue}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Ordained Purpose]{Ordained Purpose}

Like the serpentine nagas, you're in tune with cosmic forces that Ravithra once controlled.
name: Naga Domain
